definition: to be right next to/close neighbor
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: Just outside Sanya, the newly built Nanshan Temple with its 108-metre-high Buddha statue draws alot of tourists.
sentences.chinese: 緊鄰三亞，有着108米高的南山寺吸引了很多遊客。

sentences.english: The north tower butts against the outer wall.
sentences.chinese: 北邊那座塔緊鄰着外圍牆。

sentences.english: The Recurrence for a Class of Non-nearest-neighbor Random Walks in Random Environments.
sentences.chinese: 一類隨機環境中非緊鄰的隨機遊動的常返性。

sentences.english: Her quarters were right next to my Master Suite.
sentences.chinese: 她的四分之一是正確地緊鄰我的主人隨員。

sentences.english: The Bird World is next to the Monkey Hill. There are all kinds of birds.
sentences.chinese: 鳥世界緊鄰猴山，那兒有各種各樣的美麗的鳥。

sentences.english: Dark-colored wooden tables with upholstered chairs are scattered around each of the three intimate seating areas.
sentences.chinese: 深色木桌和軟墊椅子散佈在三個緊鄰的房間裏。

sentences.english: Located at the southeast of Guomao Bridge. Beside the east 3rd ring road.
sentences.chinese: 位於國貿橋東南角，緊鄰東三環。

sentences.english: The house adjacent to the church is the vicarage.
sentences.chinese: 緊鄰教堂的房子是牧師的住處。

sentences.english: SP positive cell bodies in the reticular formation close ventrolateral to nucleus ambiguus were also found.
sentences.chinese: SP陽性細胞還見於疑核腹外側緊鄰的網狀結構中。

sentences.english: It was next to sublime History Museum and across the River Reuss .
sentences.chinese: 它緊鄰莊嚴的歷史博物館，也橫跨過盧埃斯河。

sentences.english: Near Chaoyangmen, beside Yabao Market. Close to Ritan Park.
sentences.chinese: 位於朝陽門，緊鄰雅寶市場，日壇公園。

sentences.english: The community college where my ex-husband teaches is next door to the North Carolina School for the Deaf.
sentences.chinese: 我前夫任教的社區大學緊鄰北北卡羅來納州聾人學校。

sentences.english: To avoid edge effect, models should only be sliced immediately before their optical analysis.
sentences.chinese: 爲避免邊緣效應，模型應在緊鄰光學分析之前才切片。

sentences.english: Gas station is located in the hilly slopes, adjacent to the highway.
sentences.chinese: 加油站地處丘陵地帶的高坡上，緊鄰公路。

sentences.english: Located just beside the Sanyuan Bridge and Luthansa Area.
sentences.chinese: 坐落與三元橋畔，緊鄰燕莎中心。
